title: Guitar Pro 5.2 + RSE
description:
===================================================================================

Guitar Pro 5.2 + Realistic Sound Engine

===================================================================================

Latest GP5 version with RSE. Also a GP5 Manual included.

Check out the key generator in case you experience any problems with the serials: <a href="
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/4697282/Guitar_Pro_5_Key_Generator" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/4697282/Guitar_Pro_5_Key_Generator</a>

===================================================================================


Guitar Pro is a multitrack tablature editor for guitar, banjo and bass. Besides writing scores, Guitar Pro is a complete tool for young and accomplished guitarists alike to progress, compose, or simply accompany themselves.

Basic Features:

- A Powerful, Simple and Intuitive Editor - create whole scores for guitar, bass or other stringed instruments in a few minutes.
- View and Listen to your Tabs - a simple editor, allows you to view and listen to a score under the best conditions.
- A Complete Workshop for the Guitarist - the chord diagram generator, the guitar tuner, the metronome, the scale tool or the fretboard...
- Import, Export - import and export MIDI and ASCII format, and enjoy the tens of thousands of tablatures available on the Internet in Guitar Pro format.

New Features:

- Realistic Sound Engine with real instrument sounds - listen to some samples
- New Graphical Interface
- 4 Display Modes: Page, Parchment, Vertical Screen, Horizontal Screen
- Scrolling and Zoom from 30% to 200%
- Score display fully redesigned
- Automatic vertical positioning and spacing of score symbols to avoid collisions and blank spaces
- New Page Setup window
- Advanced Standard Notation (effects, beams, stem direction...)
- Manuscript Configuration for each Track
- Multiple Selection used for editing and playing tools
- Loop play
- Move Tracks Up and Down
- Voice Support (lead and bass)
- Coda, Segno (simple and double), Fine + 14 possible jumps
- 8va, 8vb, 15ma and 15mb
- Triplet Feel affected to the bar (8th or 16th)
- Improved Alternate Endings
- Improved Grace Note and Dead Note
- Possibility to add Effects on Tied Notes
- Extended Bends and Tremolo Bar
- Full Support of Artificial Harmonics
- Wah-wah
- Heavy Accentuated Notes
- Tunings associated to an Instrument
- Diagrams displayed with the score and/or under title
- Improved Speed Trainer
- MusicXML Import/Export
- PowerTab Import
- TablEdit Import
- PDF Export
- Improved ASCII Import/Export
- BMP Export of a complete page
- Improved and Simplified WAVE Export (using Windows(r) Mixer)

===================================================================================

Share & Enjoy.


by AmericanPranxter
